example.description: Automatically control videos based on timestamps.
example.goto: Click to see example video controls.
example.title: Rick Astley - Never Gonna Give You Up (Official Music Video)

loopShuffle.description: Turn a long video with multiple sections into a shuffled playlist.
loopShuffle.goto: See how to create a shuffled playlist from a video.
loopShuffle.header: Shuffle and Loop Parts of Video
loopShuffle.title: The Best of Paganini

video360.description: Operate spherical video views, moving the view to focus on specific areas.
video360.goto: Check out an example 360° video controller.
video360.title: 360°, Angel Falls, Venezuela. Aerial 8K video

intro.1: A web application for automatically controlling YouTube videos.
intro.2: Just change <1>youtube.com</1> to <3>youtubevc.com</3> in the URL bar.

youtubeController.nowTimeHover: Click to use current time in video

options.useLoopCountWeights: Use loop counts as shuffle weights
